validation.command: rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_5_check cargo check -p frankenengine-node --all-targets
rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_5_clippy cargo clippy -p frankenengine-node --all-targets -- -D warnings
rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_5_lane_scheduler_tests cargo test -p frankenengine-node --bin frankenengine-node runtime::lane_scheduler::tests -- --nocapture

notes: Queue depth now drains on actual admission (assign success), not on completion side-effects.
This preserves backlog visibility for starvation checks between completion and next admission.
